name: PuppetShow: The Curse of Ophelia Collector's Edition
name_original: PuppetShow: The Curse of Ophelia Collector's Edition
description:
PuppetShow: The Curse of Ophelia Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by AMAX Interactive. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
PuppetShow: The Curse of Ophelia Collector's Edition is available on PC.
